actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to authorize emergency appropriations for cleanup and repair of damages to facilities of Yosemite National Park and other California national parks caused by heavy rains and flooding in Decemeber 1996 and January 1997, and for other purposes.
short_title: Yosemite Emergency Restoration and Construction Act of 1997

summary.text: Yosemite Emergency Restoration and Construction Act of 1997 - Authorizes appropriations for FY 1997 for use by the Secretary of the Interior for cleanup and repair of flood damage to the facilities of Yosemite National Park and other national parks in California (including Redwood, Sequoia-Kings Canyon, and Lassen Volcanic National Parks, Devils Postpile and Lava Beds National Monuments, and Whiskeytown National Recreation Area) caused by heavy rains and flooding in December 1996 and January 1997. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1998 for the establishment of a mass transit system at Yosemite. Earmarks amounts to be used for the purchase of electric buses and alternative-fueled buses.

titles.title: Yosemite Emergency Restoration and Construction Act of 1997

A bill to authorize emergency appropriations for cleanup and repair of damages to facilities of Yosemite National Park and other California national parks caused by heavy rains and flooding in Decemeber 1996 and January 1997, and for other purposes.
